headerDisplay: This plugin works with Denon/Marantz AV Receivers. Devices are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually paired. 1. Open the Home app on your device. 2. Tap the . 3. Tap *Add Accessory*, and select *I Don't Have a Code or Cannot Scan* or *More Options*. 4. Select Your accessory and press add anyway. 5. Enter the PIN or scan the QR code, this can be found in Homebridge UI or Homebridge logs. 6. Complete the accessory setup.

zoneControl.title: Zone/Mode Control
zoneControl.description: Here select which Zone You want control.

getInputsFromDevice.title: Load Inputs From Device
getInputsFromDevice.description: This function get all available inputs and quick select options direct from device, manually configured inputs will be skipped.

getFavoritesFromDevice.title: Load Favorites
getFavoritesFromDevice.description: If enabled, Favorites will be loaded to the inputs list if exist.

getQuickSelectFromDevice.title: Load Quick Select
getQuickSelectFromDevice.description: If enabled, Quick Select will be loaded to the inputs list if exist.

getSmartSelectFromDevice.title: Load Smart Select
getSmartSelectFromDevice.description: If enabled, Smart Select will be loaded to the inputs list if exist.

getShortcutsFromDevice.title: Load Schortcuts
getShortcutsFromDevice.description: If enabled,*Sshortcuts* will be loaded to the inputs list if exist.

oneOf.title: ZM INPUT INTERNET RADIO RECENT PLAY
ZM INPUT ONLINE MIUSIC FAVORITES PLAY
ZM RESET ALL CHANNELS TO FACTORY DEFAULT
REMOTE CONTROL OFF FOR PANEL BUTTON EXCEPT MASTER VOL.
REMOTE CONTROL OFF FOR PANEL BUTTON & MASTER VOL.
REMOTE CONTROL ON FOR PANEL BUTTON & MASTER VOL.
Z2 CHANNEL FRONT L VOLUME UP
Z2 CHANNEL FRONT L VOLUME DOWN
Z2 CHANNEL FRONT R VOLUME UP
Z2 CHANNEL FRONT R VOLUME DOWN
Z3 CHANNEL FRONT L VOLUME UP
Z3 CHANNEL FRONT L VOLUME DOWN
Z3 CHANNEL FRONT R VOLUME UP
Z3 CHANNEL FRONT R VOLUME DOWN

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Here select display type in HomeKit app.

sensorPower.title: Power
sensorPower.description: This expose Power as a Contact Sensor (sensor active if power ON) to use with automations.

sensorVolume.title: Volume
sensorVolume.description: This expose Volume as a Contact Sensor (sensor active on every Volume change) to use with automations.

sensorMute.title: Mute
sensorMute.description: This expose Mute as a Contact Sensor (sensor active if mute ON) to use with automations.

sensorInput.title: Input
sensorInput.description: This expose Input as a Contact Sensor (sensor active on Input/Surround change) to use with automations.

items.title: Custom Inputs
items.description: Here create Input Sensors based on reference, sensor will active if switch to it.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own name for sensor.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: Here set the Input reference (sensor active if switch to this Input).

displayType.title: Type
displayType.description: Here select sensor type to be exposed in HomeKit app.

disableLogInfo.title: Disable Log Info
disableLogInfo.description: This disable logging values and states on every it change.

disableLogDeviceInfo.title: Disable Log Device Info
disableLogDeviceInfo.description: This disable log device info by every connections device to the network.

disableLogConnectError.title: Disable Log Connect Error
disableLogConnectError.description: This disable logging device connect error.

masterPower.title: Master Power Control
masterPower.description: The power switch for that zone will turn the entire receiver *ON* or *OFF/STANDBY* rather than just the zone itself.

masterVolume.title: Master Volume Control
masterVolume.description: The volume for that zone will set the entire receiver volume *UP* or *DOWN* rather than just the zone itself.

masterMute.title: Master Mute Control
masterMute.description: The mute switch for that zone will muted the entire receiver *ON* or *OFF* rather than just the zone itself.

infoButtonCommand.title: Info Button
infoButtonCommand.description: Here select the function of info button in RC.

volumeControl.title: Volume Control Mode
volumeControl.description: Here select what a volume control mode You want to use. If select *None/Disabled* only hardware buttons in RC app can be used to control volume.

refreshInterval.title: Refresh interval (sec)
refreshInterval.description: Here set the background data refresh interval.

mqttDebug.title: Debug
mqttDebug.description: This enable debug mode for MQTT.

mqttHost.title: IP/Hostname
mqttHost.description: Here set the IP/Hostname of MQTT Broker.

mqttPort.title: Port
mqttPort.description: Here set the port of MQTT Broker.

mqttAuth.title: Authorization
mqttAuth.description: This enable authorization for MQTT Broker.

mqttUser.title: User
mqttUser.description: Here set the user of MQTT Broker.

mqttPasswd.title: Password
mqttPasswd.description: Here set the password of MQTT Broker.
